item.title: Add Friend
item.description: github With the finality of adding a new friend to the friend list, this endpoint will alter the respective user’s row in the [[friend_list table]].

item.title: Buy Nfts
item.description: github This endpoint expect ERC1155 address. When a new transaction is initiated, the address and id passed in the body of the request will be used to populate one transaction using [[ERC1155 ABI]] , address and id.

item.title: Remove Friend
item.description: github Expect an target that could be an email, phone or wallet address, then remove it from the [[friend_list table]].

item.title: Send Nft
item.description: github it expects a target (address, email or phone), the nft address and nft id to be sent to another Conpay user or external wallet.

item.title: Send Token
item.description: github it expects a target (address, email or phone) and the token amount to be sent to another Conpay user or external wallet.
